alert.note: Alert for Appling; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wayne and east central Appling Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Odum, or 8 miles northwest of Jesup, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Gardi, Odum and Doctortown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
